thread.title: Explore vibrancy of Dubai at Night with Dubai 360 website
thread.title_full: Explore vibrancy of Dubai at Night with Dubai 360 website

title: Explore vibrancy of Dubai at Night with Dubai 360 website
text:
Dubai: Suspects implicated in economic crimes Dubai Marina at Night 
Dubai, August 4th, 2015: Over the past few decades, Dubai has progressed to become an iconic metropolis boasting the tallest skyline in the world. This world famous skyline has been captured in pictures by millions of tourists every year. Now, Dubai 360 is letting you explore the city by night from the comfort of your own home as it announces a major new update to www.Dubai360.com , the world's largest and highest quality interactive city tour. This new upgrade features a number of city landmarks with clickable hotspots, giving visitors a chance to experience destinations across Dubai. 
Shot over the course of 30 nights, the newly released content showcases striking panoramas of the city and it's skyline as it comes to life at night. Commenting on the update, Ismaeil Al Hashmi, Project Director for Dubai 360 said, "Dubai truly comes alive at night with a stunning skyline that renders a completely different appeal once the sun goes down. The Dubai 360 team have worked tirelessly to capture these gems of panoramas which we hope will showcase Dubai with its ambitious skyscrapers lighting up the skyline. This update features over 140 panoramas taking the total number of images on Dubai 360 to over 2,200". New locations and panoramas added to the tour include - Box Park, City Walk, Wafi Center Courtyard, Souk Madinat Jumeirah, Raffles Rooftop Garden, Emirates Golf Club - the Nick Faldo Course, Dubai Marina, Downtown Dubai and Sheikh Zayed Road. 
To experience Dubai 360, please visit www.Dubai360.com . About Dubai360 Dubai360 allows viewers to explore every angle of the city from the comfort of their own home, providing a first-hand experience that has never been seen before in the virtual world. Following the site's launch in January 2015, development continues and the tour now utilizes over 2,200 pieces of panoramic video and photo content, making Dubai360 the world's largest and highest quality interactive city tour. Through the use of state of the art technology, Dubai360 redefines how cities are viewed and explored worldwide
For further information, please contact:Rohan Cornelio / Sahithya Shetty
